text: Prof Bray  We seem to respond to beverages with calories in a different way to foods.  #NINS2013

text: Gluckman  We've not thought enough about how you wean children to have optimal taste and food preferences.  #NINS2013

label: Information

text: Gluckman  30% of women in Asia's big cities get gestational diabetes. A high proportion of them go on to develop type 2 diabetes  #NINS2013

label: Information
